title: S2 Ep90: Voices From The Other Side w/ Denise Jones & John Zaffis - Hr.1
itunes:title: Voices From The Other Side w/ Denise Jones & John Zaffis - Hr.1
description: Extreme Haunting Survivor/Paranormal Investigator Denise Jones and Exorcist John Zaffis join Darkness Radio for a special two hour show recapping Denise's unusual story about her son, Cole.  Cole is the real life inspiration for the movie, The Sixth Sense.  Denise and John will also talk about paranormal cases that they have worked on together as well!
itunes:author: Darkness Radio
dc:creator: Darkness Radio
